title: The Inefficiencies of Interpolation Techniques for Ultrasound Tomography Image Reconstruction
details: TQ Huy, DM Duc, LT Theu, NT Thu, KB Prakash… - Innovations and Challenges …, 2025
abstract: This paper examines and applies three interpolation techniques—nearest neighbor, bilinear, and bicubic—in the DBIM method. The goal of this work is to identify the application limits of these interpolation techniques in DBIM, an issue not previously …
